title: Eric Newman of JC Newman
itunes:title: Eric Newman of JC Newman
description:
Eric Newman of JC Newman joins us. JC Newman is the company behind Diamond Crown and Brick House. They are also the distributor of Arturo Fuente in the USA. We will talk to JC Newman and find out about new Opus X, Diamond Crown and more on The Cigar Authority.

Today we smoke the Julius Caesar 1895 Perfecto that was part of the care package.
